title: Bright Ones
lyrics:
Back to the beginning
Let's adjust the lighting
Illuminate the whole thing
We're a captive audience
Taken by Your brilliance
Looking for the glorious



Oh-oh-ooh, oh-oh-oooh

You're lighting us up, lighting us up

Oh-oh-ooh, oh-oh-oooh



We are Your bright ones

Lit up with Your love

Glowing in darkness

We shine with You

We are Your bright ones

Lit up with Your love

Glowing in darkness

We shine with You



We were born of kindness

Carriers of promise

To be Your kingdom coming

We have found the vibrance

Children of Your likeness

Alive to be a witness



Oh-oh-ooh, oh-oh-oooh

You're lighting us up, lighting us up

Oh-oh-ooh, oh-oh-oooh



We are Your bright ones

Lit up with Your love

Glowing in darkness

We shine with You

We are Your bright ones

Lit up with Your love

Glowing in darkness

We shine with You



See us shining from a distance

Your light's burning bright within us

See us shining from a distance (a distance)

There's no darkness that could dim this (no darkness that could dim this)

See us shining from a distance (shining from a distance)

Your light's burning bright within us (burning bright, burning bright)

See us shining from a distance (can You see us? can You see us?)

There's no darkness that could dim this!



We are Your bright ones

Lit up with Your love

Glowing in darkness

We shine with You

We are Your bright ones

Lit up with Your love

Glowing in darkness

We shine with You

We shine with You
